TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content: spend a weekend and came out this, now almost every two lunches have a game crash ,memory is really...........
Link dead, again, so many links are dead around here because someone/admin blocked/ruined spaceport/curse links, thanks a lot admins

Link dead, again, so many links are dead around here because someone/admin blocked/ruined spaceport/curse links, thanks a lot admins

Here you go bud. This is a link to where most of bobcats mods are being maintained. Including the ISS pack. I will say its a bit buggy because it does need a overhaul but it def works. Don't use the Zarya solar panels and the truss system and you will be ok. I recommend Near Future construction and Kosmos solar arrays as a substitute for the bugged pieces. You can use use the bugged pieces if you are looking for 100% realism but they are really buggy and use at your own risk.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

Edited October 4, 2014 by sp1989
Actually, Zarya panels are fine, they just don't play well with the Proton fairings. Truss is broken, though.

Actually, Zarya panels are fine, they just don't play well with the Proton fairings. Truss is broken, though.

Oh you said last time that there was something wrong with the Zarya panels. Glad they are working now. I know its tough but is there an eta on the fixed trusses?

Thanks a lot, I got that one yesterday, didn't notice it's the same thing just under different thread.

I've read a post that there were some issues with license of some mod hosting service so they killed all the links. Hmm. Thought it was spaceport, but that one also changed to curse and the links are all effectively dead on many mods.

I'll see how it goes later, it's going to be a fun time trying to get all the mods work.

Thanks a lot, I got that one yesterday, didn't notice it's the same thing just under different thread.

I've read a post that there were some issues with license of some mod hosting service so they killed all the links. Hmm. Thought it was spaceport, but that one also changed to curse and the links are all effectively dead on many mods.

I'll see how it goes later, it's going to be a fun time trying to get all the mods work.

They all work and they are being maintained by a user named Dragon01. He's doing a pretty good job at keeping them useable through the multiple new releases. However it would be truly wonderful if Bobcat officially came back to update everything, but like life things come and go. So the bobcat mods are very playable and useable. There are a few modders out there playing with soviet style rockets as well as base building mods. Alexustas is working on an epic base building mod called Konquest. If he ever releases it, it will truly be something to behold. Roverdude has released an incredible base building mod MKS/OKS. raidernick is building all most of the soviet and American probes launched along with some of the rockets that took them there. DennyTX although he hasn't updated much in while still look pretty active has some incredible High Fidelity Soviet and American Mods. His Proton is extremely accurate and a wonderful launcher if you can spare the memory. So I mean Bobcat set the standard but there are plenty of modders out there who are exceeding what bobcat did. I think when everyone first starts out they get drawn to Bobcat because of HOME and the Soviet and American packs. But even when I first started HOME was being patched and hotfixed, so they are quite dated and you can tell as the graphics get better in the game how dated they are. I mean if you see them in any version under .22 they look amazing. Now with the exception of he Soyuz its a little dated.

Edited October 4, 2014 by sp1989

I would say if you can inbox bobcat. He has been gradually coming back to the forums lately and he is working on some new stuff. He did say that he wasn't working replicas right now. However a proposition like that might get his attention. The trusses need some serious work in this pack. other then that like I said talk to bobcat.
Jedald!!! You can't launch the station mock-up!

Hey all

I am aware that there are some parts missing to this mod and understand that people have real lives. This question has probably been asked, does the CAM module exist for this mod? Also the SPP module. Or is this a case of making ur own with stock parts?

Hey all

I am aware that there are some parts missing to this mod and understand that people have real lives. This question has probably been asked, does the CAM module exist for this mod? Also the SPP module. Or is this a case of making ur own with stock parts?

Yea you are gonna have to make your own. This mod consists of how the ISS exists in it current iteration. Not how it was supposed to look. So yea you are gonna have to make your own parts. The CAM can be made with existing parts, and with procedural parts and a good solar panels pack you could definitely make the SPP. Good luck.
